name: Farm Life 2 v1
description:
Instructions

Click on any sprite every 60 seconds to gather products from them.

Click in the back to open Stats list

In 6:00 am/pm the shopkeeper comes there to sell your products to make money or to buy animal food or upgrade to get more products per click.

For any bug report or feedback write in comments

You are free to remix it for making something better.

If Someone knows how to save on cloud variables in Scratch 3 please tell me.

If you like it tell it to me for new updates based on your comments.

Credits
